name: posOrNeg
description: Returns either -1 or 1, to help in assigning a random positive or negative sign to a number.

name: randItem
description: Returns a random item from a group of items.
usage:
import { randItem } from 'pickitt'

const testArray = ['item1', 'item2', 'item3']

const randomElement = randItem(testArray) // <-- 'item1', 'item2', or 'item3'
